meanings.definition: A spicy sauce made from tomatoes, onions, and peppers.
meanings.sent1: I love to dip my chips in salsa.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes the best salsa for taco night.
meanings.sent3: The salsa added a kick to the bland dish.
meanings.sent4: Her salsa recipe is like a burst of flavor in your mouth.
meanings.sent5: The salsa was so spicy, it made my eyes water.
